Naming/PredicatePrefix.description:
Description

Predicate method names should not be prefixed and end with a `?`.
Naming/PredicatePrefix.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

NamePrefix: ['is_', 'has_', 'have_', 'does_'] (type: list)
ForbiddenPrefixes: ['is_', 'has_', 'have_', 'does_'] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: ['is_a?'] (type: list)
MethodDefinitionMacros: ['define_method', 'define_singleton_method'] (type: list)
UseSorbetSigs: False (type: bool)
